text: is a Japanese tarento and comedian. She formed the comedy duo Oasiz with Kayoko Okubo. Mitsuura is represented with Production Jinrikisha. ==Filmography== ===Current appearances=== {|class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Network ! Notes !
